name: @cagov/decal
description: A lightweight tool for creating, developing, bundling, and sharing your web UI component libraries.

scripts.build: npx tsc && node dist/index.js build -d throwaway/example-project
scripts.bundle: npx tsc && node dist/index.js bundle -d throwaway/example-project
scripts.new: npx tsc && node dist/index.js new component -d throwaway/example-project
scripts.serve: npx tsc && node dist/index.js serve -d throwaway/example-project
scripts.newProject: npx tsc && node dist/index.js new project -d throwaway

author: @cagov
